title: If you could get now instantly and completely guaranteed right and complete answer to ANY of your questions, which one question would you ask? What would be the one question you would be interested most in having answered? - Quora

response.answer_text: My question would be a rather simple one: What is the most effective way for me to acquire as much knowledge as possible? I thought about a lot of questions to ask and none of them seemed all too exciting. I do not want to find out what happens after death, or which religion was right, as it takes away from the surprise. I might either get entirely crushed by the answer or feel entitled to tell everyone else they are wrong, and life would become a lot less exciting when the biggest surprise of my lifetime goes away. I do not want to learn the reason for me being here and alive because I have spent years finding it myself, and if this is wrong, then that is completely okay. I will still want to find the truth myself because the journey I have been on in trying to find an answer was the most incredible experience I could have ever imagined. I do not want to find out who my perfect partner is because that makes the struggle worthless and it makes me not have a choice in the matter anymore. I want to chose my love myself, even that means they are not perfect. That just means it will be a more exciting journey with them, filled with ups and downs. Just think how boring a roller-coaster ride would be that always goes straight, and ends without going up, down, left or right even once. But when I know how I can learn the most effective way I will be able to change the world much faster. I will be able to read every book I can imagine, learn about so many lives and stories that it will feel like I have lived multiple lives myself, and I will have such a grand knowledge base that I can go to all my goals in a lifetime. I want to know how I can acquire the most knowledge so I can share it all with the world, teach others and show them the result of this knowledge. That way I could change the world in he most drastic way.

Under this hypothetical question, since i am being guaranteed of a 100% honest answer in reply. So i would ask them "What is your worst kept secret that no one else knows?"  After this i'll make sure that i won't misuse this information and wouldn't judge them on this either. Following things may happen as a consequence of sharing this information with me by them -  If secret was something over which they feel guilty: this will help them overcome this feeling and move on and come to peace with themselvesIf they didn't share secret with anyone else because they don't trust people easily: this will help them overcome their inhibitions and start trusting people and making deeper relationshipsIf they didn't share secret because they are self critical and self judgmental: this will help them to loosen up themselves and start doing what makes them happyIf they were hiding the secret because they were concerned what others will think of them: this will help them to start being themselves and not looking at themselves from society's eyes   This is what they will get. What will i get, well a friend for lifetime.
